nodes.text: Froswythe was a planet in the Colonies. It was a major source of meat and animal-based textiles for the Colonies and Core Worlds. Roaming herds of livestock included banthas and nerfs. Ycaqt were used for transportation.
Its sparsely-populated rolling prairies were home to bandit hideaways and tourist-oriented ranches, where livestock had to be guarded against indigenous plains panthers.
During the New Jedi Order era, Core World criminal Fegred Ewd had a hideaway on Froswythe, and Jerren Durs owned a leisure ranch called Durs Ranch.
